compliant.section: 本公司努力透過採取適當的物理、技術及組織措施保護個人資訊，以防止未經授權或非法取得、使用、處理或更改本公司透過其服務自您所取得的個人資訊，並防止此類個人資訊違反規定或遺失，如匿名化、擬匿名化、加密 (如在傳輸過程透過超文字安全傳輸通訊協定 (HTTPS) 加密)、限制存取等的措施。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 32, requiring companies to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data.

compliant.section: 若您對個人資訊的保護機制或本政策有任何疑慮，請傳送電子郵件至 global-privacy@htc.com
compliant.legal provisions: Providing a contact point for privacy concerns aligns with the transparency and information requirements outlined in Articles 12, 13, and 14.

non_compliant.section: 雖然本公司及第三方可能提供特定選擇，如本政策以下所述，但網頁瀏覽器訊號 (包括「不追蹤」或「DNT」) 及類似機制仍有許多方式可指示貴用戶選擇停用追蹤，且本公司不一定完全知悉或認可所有該類機制。 貴用戶可改用各種其他工具來控制資料收集和使用，包括本政策中所述的控制。
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section raises concerns regarding unambiguous consent (Article 7(3)) and the right to object (Article 21). The language is vague and doesn't clearly state how user choices regarding tracking are implemented.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state how the company honors browser signals (like "Do Not Track") and provide users with granular control over data collection. Explain the mechanisms used to obtain unambiguous consent for data processing and detail how users can exercise their right to object.
